means: 小于一般尺寸的，不够大的

sentence.Network_en: They squashed into an undersized reception room.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们挤到了一个较小的接待室里。

sentence.Network_en: At school I was fairly skinny and undersized.
He was undersized, as were all the local children I was to meet.
sentence.Network_cn: 他个头偏矮，跟我见到的所有当地孩子一样。

entry.tran: 小于一般尺寸的；偏小的
entry.def: Undersized people or things are smaller than usual, or smaller than they should be.

example.ex: They squashed into an undersized reception room...
example.tran: 他们挤到了一个较小的接待室里。

means.word_mean: 1. smaller than normal for its kind

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"在……下"; 2. "副手"; 3. 表示"不足,不够"

stems_affixes.word_buile: under在……下+handed手的→在底下做手脚
under不足,不够+develop发展+ed……的→发展不够
under不足,不够+graduate大学毕业[生]→n.大学肄业生,[尚未取得学位的]大学生;adj.大学生的
under不足,不够+populate移民于+ed表形容词→adj.人口稀少的
under不足,不够+sized大小的→不够大的
under在……下+neath下面→adv.在下面 prep.在……的下面
